newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo Disneyland operator to raise fees from April.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo Disneyland operator to raise fees from April.

text.p: Tokyo Disneyland operator Oriental Land Co Ltd said on Wednesday it would raise entrance prices and other fees at the theme park as of April 1, in line with the planned two percent rise in Japan's sales tax.
The standard one-day pass to Tokyo Disneyland for adults over 18 years old will be raised by 100 yen to 5,200 yen, the company said in a statement.
The same pass for those aged between 12 to 17 will be raised 90 yen to 4,590 yen and for those between four and 11 will be increased 70 yen to 3,570 yen, it said.
